name: CXCallController
desc: A programmatic interface for interacting with and observing calls.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a new call controller with a private, serial queue, which is used for calling completion blocks.

items.name: init(queue: DispatchQueue)
items.desc: Initializes a new call controller with a specified queue, which is used for calling completion blocks.

items.name: var callObserver: CXCallObserver
items.desc: Returns an observer for active calls.

items.name: func request(CXTransaction, completion: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests that the actions in the specified transaction be asynchronously performed by the telephony provider.

items.name: func requestTransaction(with: CXAction, completion: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests that the transaction that contains the specified action be asynchronously performed by the telephony provider.

items.name: func requestTransaction(with: [CXAction], completion: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests that the transaction that contains the specified actions be asynchronously performed by the telephony provider.

items.name: enum CXErrorCodeRequestTransactionError.Code
items.desc: Error codes for the CallKit Constants error domain.

items.name: let CXErrorDomainRequestTransaction: String
items.desc: Domain for errors when requesting a transaction from a call controller. See CallKit Constants for possible error codes.
